calculations.name: View By
calculations.tableau_expression:
CASE [Parameters].[View By]
WHEN "Industry Name" THEN [TRBC Industry Name]
WHEN "Activity Name" THEN [TRBC Activity Name]
ELSE [TRBC Economic Sector Name]
END

WHEN "Industry Name" THEN [TRBC Industry Name]
WHEN "Activity Name" THEN [TRBC Activity Name]
